titleStmt.title: The resolution of the Earle of Essex to the King [sic] most Excellent Maiestie wherein is declared his honourable intentions to attaine nothing but what shall tend to advancement of His Majesties honour and the good of the Common-wealth : whereunto is annexed the
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
